body:
I see this in the Circle output

```
$ mkdir -p ~/docker; test '!' -e ~/docker/image.tar || rm ~/docker/image.tar; docker save app:build > ~/docker/image.tar; ls -l ~/docker

Error response from daemon: could not find image: no such id: app:build
total 0
-rw-rw-r-- 1 ubuntu ubuntu 0 Feb 29 21:30 image.tar 
```

I think we need to `s/app:build/normandy:build/g`?
